notes.note:
Your login management has improved with the ability to reverse alpha sort (Name Z-A) in Lockwise, which you can [access under Logins and Passwords][1]. 


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/manage-passwords-firefox-desktop-firefox-lockwise

Firefox now makes [importing your bookmarks and history][1] from the new Microsoft Edge browser on Windows and Mac a cinch.


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/import-bookmarks-internet-explorer-or-microsoft-edge

Add-ons installed by external applications can now be [removed using the Add-ons Manager][1] (about:addons). Going forward, only users can install add-ons; they cannot be installed by an application.


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons

With [Facebook Container][1], prevent Facebook from tracking you around the web - Facebook logins, likes and comments are automatically blocked on non-Facebook sites. But do you need to login with Facebook on a website? Now you can [create an exception by adding custom sites][2] to the Facebook Container wherever you need to.


  [1]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/facebook-container/
  [2]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/add-websites-facebook-container-exceptions-list
Firefox now provides better privacy for your web voice and video calls through support for mDNS ICE by cloaking your computer’s IP address with a random ID in certain WebRTC scenarios.

system_requirements:
## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows 7
 - Windows 8
 - Windows 10

### Recommended Hardware
-  Pentium 4 or newer processor that supports SSE2
-  512MB of RAM / 2GB of RAM for the 64-bit version
-  200MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- macOS 10.9
- macOS 10.10
- macOS 10.11
- macOS 10.12
- macOS 10.13
- macOS 10.14
- macOS 10.15

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - GTK+ 3.4 or higher
    - GLib 2.22 or higher
    - Pango 1.22 or higher
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
    - libstdc++ 4.6.1 or higher
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - GNOME 2.16 or higher
    - PulseAudio
text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][0] who contributed to this release of Firefox.

[0]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2020/03/06/firefox-74-new-contributors/
title: Firefox 74.0 Release
